area.title: Area Calculator
area.description: Calculate the area of circle, square or triangle online. Simple and accurate calculator with formulas.

seo.title: Online Area Calculator - Circle, Square, Triangle

overview.title: About Area Calculator
overview.content: Online calculator for calculating the area of basic geometric shapes: circle, square and triangle. Easy-to-use tool with automatic calculation using formulas. Suitable for students, engineers and anyone who needs to quickly calculate the area of a shape.
overview.additionalContent: Our area calculator supports three fundamental geometric shapes that are commonly used in mathematics, engineering, and everyday calculations. Whether you're a student learning geometry, an engineer working on construction projects, or simply need to calculate the area of a room, this tool provides accurate results instantly.

calculation.title: How Area is Calculated
calculation.content: Circle area is calculated using the formula S = π × r², where r is the radius. Square area is calculated as S = a², where a is the side length. Triangle area is calculated using the formula S = ½ × a × h, where a is the base and h is the height.
calculation.circleDescription: Where r is the radius of the circle
calculation.squareDescription: Where a is the length of one side
calculation.triangleDescription: Where a is base and h is height

advantages.title: Calculator Advantages
advantages.content: Fast and accurate calculations, support for basic geometric shapes, intuitive interface, automatic application of mathematical formulas, results with precision up to 2 decimal places.
items: No registration or software installation required
Free to use with no limitations

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.content: Make sure all values are positive. For circle enter radius, for square - side length, for triangle - base and height. Result is displayed in square units of measurement.
notes: Always use the same units for all measurements
For circles, measure from center to edge for radius
For triangles, height must be perpendicular to the base
Results are displayed in square units of your input
Use decimal notation for precise calculations

examples.title: Calculation Examples
examples.circleDescription: The area of a circle with radius 5 units is approximately 78.54 square units.
examples.squareDescription: The area of a square with side length 7 units is 49 square units.
examples.triangleDescription: The area of a triangle with base 8 units and height 6 units is 24 square units.

applications.title: Common Applications
constructionItems: Calculating floor area for flooring materials

types.title: Types of Loans
types.content: In the modern banking system, there are many types of loans, each designed to solve specific financial needs:
types.mortgageDesc: long-term loan for real estate purchase secured by the property being purchased
types.autoDesc: loan for car purchase with the vehicle serving as collateral
types.personalDesc: unsecured loan for any personal needs without collateral requirements
types.businessDesc: loan for business development and working capital needs
types.refinancingDesc: loan restructuring to improve terms on existing debt

rates.title: Types of Interest Rates
rates.content: Interest rate is a key loan parameter that determines the cost of borrowed funds:
rates.fixedDesc: remains unchanged throughout the loan term, ensuring payment predictability
rates.variableDesc: changes based on central bank rates and market conditions
rates.mixedDesc: fixed for initial period, then converts to variable

payment.title: Loan Repayment Schemes
payment.content: The choice of repayment scheme affects monthly payment amounts and total interest paid:

annuity.title: Annuity Payments
annuity.desc: equal monthly payments throughout the loan term
annuity.advantages: Advantages: budget stability, easy expense planning

differentiated.title: Differentiated Payments
differentiated.desc: decreasing payments with fixed principal portion
differentiated.advantages: Advantages: lower total interest, faster principal repayment

factors.content: Banks consider multiple factors when determining interest rates and loan conditions:

overview.title: What are Investments
overview.content: Investments are a way of investing money with the aim of generating income. This is one of the most effective ways to grow capital for long-term financial planning.

types.title: Types of Investments
types.content: There are several main types of investments:
types.simple: Investments without capitalization — interest is accrued but not added to the principal amount
types.capitalized: Investments with capitalization — interest is periodically added to the principal amount
types.compound: Investments with compound interest — interest is accrued on a constantly growing amount

advantages.title: Advantages of Investments
advantages.content: Investments have many advantages:
advantages.safety: High reliability with proper instrument selection
advantages.liquidity: Possibility of early exit (with loss of interest)

osago.title: OSAGO Calculator
osago.description: Calculate стоимость полиса ОСАГО с учётом региона, мощности двигателя, возраста водителя и других факторов

seo.title: OSAGO Calculator: расчёт стоимости полиса обязательного страхования

overview.title: OSAGO Calculator для расчёта стоимости полиса
overview.content: OSAGO Calculator — это профессиональный инструмент для расчёта стоимости полиса обязательного страхования автогражданской ответственности. С помощью нашего калькулятора вы сможете рассчитать точную стоимость ОСАГО с учётом всех коэффициентов: территории, возраста и стажа водителя, мощности двигателя, количества водителей и коэффициента бонус-малус.

coefficients.title: OSAGO Calculation Coefficients
coefficients.content: OSAGO cost is calculated by formula: Base rate × KT × KBM × KVS × KM × KO
coefficients.territory: KT (territory coefficient): Moscow = 2.0, St. Petersburg = 1.8, other regions = 1.0
coefficients.ageExperience: KVS (age-experience): age < 22 and experience < 3 years = 1.8, otherwise = 1.0
coefficients.bonusMalus: KBM (bonus-malus): from 0.5 to 2.45 depending on driving history

advantages.title: Benefits of using OSAGO Calculator
advantages.content: OSAGO Calculator предоставляет множество преимуществ для планирования страхования:
advantages.quick: Quick policy cost calculation in minutes
advantages.accurate: Accurate calculation considering all current coefficients
advantages.comparison: Ability to compare costs at different insurance companies
advantages.savings: Time and money savings when choosing optimal policy

tips.title: Tips for choosing OSAGO
tips.content: To choose optimal OSAGO policy:
tips.compare: Compare offers from different insurance companies
tips.bonusMalus: Maintain good bonus-malus coefficient with accident-free driving
tips.early: Renew policy in advance to maintain discounts
tips.documents: Prepare all necessary documents in advance

coefficients.title: KASKO Calculation Coefficients
coefficients.content: KASKO cost calculation takes into account various coefficients:
coefficients.age: Kage: under 22 years = 1.5, 22-30 years = 1.2, over 30 years = 1.0
coefficients.experience: Kexperience: under 3 years = 1.3, 3-10 years = 1.1, over 10 years = 1.0

calculation.title: How Leasing is Calculated
calculation.content: Leasing is calculated using annuity payment formula considering down payment, contract term, interest rate and buyout value.
calculation.financing: Financing Amount = Car Value - Down Payment - Buyout Value
calculation.payment: Monthly Payment is calculated using annuity formula
calculation.total: Total Amount = Monthly Payment × Term + Down Payment + Buyout Value
calculation.overpayment: Total Interest = Total Amount - Car Value

seo.title: Wallpaper Calculator Online

overview.title: About Wallpaper Calculator
overview.content: Online wallpaper calculator will help quickly calculate how many wallpaper rolls are needed for room wallpapering. Calculations take into account walls, windows, doors and reserve. The result is presented in a convenient table for renovation planning.

overview.content: Online concrete calculator: accurate calculation of cement, sand, gravel and water for preparing concrete mix of the required grade. Suitable for calculating concrete mix for foundation, walls and other structures.

calculation.content: Concrete mix calculation includes several steps to obtain an accurate result.

grades.title: Concrete Grades
grades.content: The calculator supports calculation of various concrete grades with their characteristics.

M100.title: Concrete M100
M100.content: Concrete for non-load-bearing structures, retaining walls, foundations for light buildings.

M150.title: Concrete M150
M150.content: Concrete for lightly loaded structures, screeds, blind areas, sidewalks.

M200.title: Concrete M200
M200.content: Concrete for foundations, walls, floors in low-rise construction.

M250.title: Concrete M250
M250.content: Concrete for loaded structures, columns, beams, floor slabs.

M300.title: Concrete M300
M300.content: Concrete for heavily loaded structures, bridges, overpasses, industrial buildings.

M400.title: Concrete M400
M400.content: Concrete for critical structures, hydraulic structures.

tips.content: Follow our recommendations for accurate concrete calculation.

leasing.title: Auto Leasing Calculator
leasing.description: Calculate monthly payments and total cost of auto leasing

seo.title: Online Auto Leasing Calculator

overview.title: About Auto Leasing Calculator
overview.content: Online auto leasing calculator helps calculate monthly payments, overpayment and total payments under leasing agreement. Convenient tool for evaluating auto leasing profitability.

calculation.title: How Leasing is Calculated
calculation.content: Leasing is calculated using annuity payment formula considering down payment, contract term, interest rate and buyout value.
calculation.financing: Financing Amount = Car Value - Down Payment - Buyout Value
calculation.payment: Monthly Payment is calculated using annuity formula
calculation.total: Total Amount = Monthly Payment × Term + Down Payment + Buyout Value
calculation.overpayment: Total Interest = Total Amount - Car Value

advantages.title: Calculator Benefits
advantages.content: Our auto leasing calculator helps you make an informed decision about auto leasing profitability.

fuel.title: Fuel Consumption Calculator
fuel.description: Calculate fuel consumption, travel distance and fuel costs for trip planning

seo.title: Fuel Consumption Calculator: Calculate Distance and Costs

overview.title: Fuel Consumption Calculator
overview.content: Fuel consumption calculator is a professional tool for calculating fuel consumption, travel distance and costs. With our calculator you can calculate how much fuel you need for a trip, what distance you can cover with available fuel and plan your fuel costs.

modes.title: Calculation Modes
modes.content: Our fuel consumption calculator provides two calculation modes:
modes.distance: Distance calculation by fuel amount and consumption
modes.fuel: Calculation of required fuel amount for trip

advantages.title: Calculator Benefits
advantages.content: Fuel consumption calculator provides many benefits for trip planning:
advantages.accurate: Accurate calculations based on real data

tips.title: Fuel Economy Tips
tips.content: To reduce fuel consumption:
tips.measure: Regularly measure your car's fuel consumption
tips.maintenance: Keep your car in good technical condition
tips.planning: Plan routes in advance to avoid traffic jams
